programme.title: Wild South Africa
programme.desc: Sunshine, sandy beaches and palm trees - not only does the Caribbean boast them, so too does South Africa's East Coast. It is hot and sticky all year round - the mangroves and the bayous in the east of the country present ideal conditions for strange frogs, mudskippers and enormous Nile crocodiles(n)

programme.title: Wild South Africa
programme.desc: From the savanna to the desert, the heart of South Africa is home to the most successful hunters, extremely odd animals, and the setting for one of the most colorful natural spectacles on the planet! Far from the cape and coasts, lie vast semideserts and dry savannas(n)

programme.title: Wild South Africa
programme.desc: Nowhere else on earth do Africa and Antarctica so impressively come together as at South Africa's Cape! It's a place where cold-loving penguins live alongside desert-dwelling ostriches, and which is similarly home to surfing sea snails and live-bearing chameleons(n)

programme.title: Russia\u0027s Wild Sea
programme.desc: Explores the challenges of living in an unforgiving environment and examines the adaptations and strategies animals have developed(n)

programme.title: Russia\u0027s Wild Sea
programme.desc: Introduces the years when there is enough to go around. Red-crowned cranes perform their mating dances on the Island of Hokkaido where foxes scavenge sika deer(n)

programme.title: America\u0027s National Parks Compilations
programme.desc: Olympic National Park is home to orcas, bald eagles, otters and Roosevelt Elk. Everglades is home to alligators, Florida panthers, and many species of birds(n)

programme.title: World Of The Wild
programme.desc: Considered the rainforests of the sea, coral reefs comprise some of the most diverse ecosystems on the planet. Stretching for over two-thousand-three-hundred kilometers, this is the largest coral reef system in the world(n)

programme.title: World Of The Wild
programme.desc: The great plains of North America have taken the name "prairie" from the French for meadow. Formed in the rain shadow cast by the nearly five-thousand kilometre length of the Rocky Mountain range, the limited rainfall on the prairie has created a unique and immense grassland ecosystem(n)

programme.title: Tiger\u0027s Revenge
programme.desc: Tiger's Revenge is the story of two tiger sisters: Sundari, powerful but unable to become pregnant for more than two years and her sister Krishnaa, with a litter of three healthy cubs(n)

programme.title: Battle For The Pride
programme.desc: Botswana is home to the largest male lions on the planet but only 1 out of 8 males ever make it to adulthood. Lion cubs start their life vulnerable and weak and threats come from all sides(n)

programme.title: Islands Of The Monsoon
programme.desc: As baby elephant loka navigates his way among the behemoths he must learn some crucial life lessons - suckling, swimming and getting a handle on his unwieldy trunk all under the watchful eye of his family(n)

programme.title: Africa\u0027s Super Snake
programme.desc: She's 20 feet long. She has no hands, no arms, no legs, but she'll crush you to death in 15 minutes. She's an African Rock python and she's queen of the constrictors. In Kwa Zulu Natal, South Africa, she's greatly feared because of her size, strength and gruesome man-eating reputation(n)

programme.title: Tiger\u0027s Revenge
programme.desc: Tiger's Revenge is the story of two tiger sisters: Sundari, powerful but unable to become pregnant for more than two years and her sister Krishnaa, with a litter of three healthy cubs(n)

programme.title: Battle For The Pride
programme.desc: Botswana is home to the largest male lions on the planet but only 1 out of 8 males ever make it to adulthood. Lion cubs start their life vulnerable and weak and threats come from all sides(n)

programme.title: Blood Rivals: Hippo Vs. Lion
programme.desc: For a dominant hippo bull, his territory is his empire. By day his rule is indisputable; he's territorial and aggressive. But at night, dark forces grip the land and control slips to the the predators. To get to their grazing lands, the hippos must leave the safety of the river(n)

programme.title: Ultimate Rivals: Cats Vs Dogs
programme.desc: Canines and felines have been living side by side in Africa for hundreds of thousands of years, and they've never really gotten along-not even amongst themselves. Throw the hyena into the mix and they're all nightmare neighbors(n)

programme.title: Animal Record Breakers
programme.desc: Nature always pushes the boundaries of evolution, never ceasing to amaze us with record breaking skills. Now with intimate footage we review the animal kingdom, picking out some of the most dramatic record breakers to examine how and why they've become such champs(n)

programme.title: Animal Fight Club
programme.desc: Reveals what happens when the Animal Kingdoms biggest animals fight tooth and claw, and brings you closer than ever before to adrenaline-packed fights from some of the worlds most extreme environments(n)

programme.title: Animal Fight Club
programme.desc: Reveals what happens when the Animal Kingdoms most audacious species fight tooth and claw, and brings you closer than ever before to adrenaline-packed fights from all four corners of the globe. In a heavy-weight showdown, one horn takes on two, as a rhino and a buffalo get brutal on the battlefield(n)

programme.title: Animal Fight Club
programme.desc: This episode reveals what happens when the Animal Kingdoms most awesome species fight tooth and claw, and brings you closer than ever before to adrenaline-packed fights from North America, South America, and beyond(n)

programme.title: Animal Fight Club
programme.desc: This episode reveals the secret tactics of the Animal Kingdom's most ferocious feline fighters, and brings you closer than ever before to adrenaline-packed fights from Africa, the Americas and beyond(n)

programme.title: Animal Fight Club
programme.desc: Reveals what happens when the Animal Kingdoms most vicious species go head to head, and brings you closer than ever before to adrenaline-packed fights from the USA and beyond. In an all-American big cat showdown, a bobcat and a lynx fight tooth and claw for territory(n)

programme.title: Islands Of The Monsoon
programme.desc: In Sri Lanka's parched lowlands, monkeys eat succulent water lilies at a lake in a forest clearing. Alongside them, deer and wild boar come to drink. It's a peaceful scene - but it can't last(n)

programme.title: Amazon\u0027s Electric Fish
programme.desc: The Amazon has the highest diversity of life on the planet, but what lies below it is truly shocking. In its deep muddy rivers, a freak-show of fish life has exploded, with some of the strangest shapes and weirdest adaptations on Earth(n)

programme.title: Monster Fish
programme.desc: Aquatic ecologist Zeb Hogan continues his quest to find and protect the world's largest freshwater fish in the frigid rivers of Mongolia. He will travel by plane, truck, and horseback to find the largest trout known as the Hucho taimen(n)

programme.desc: Programa de música alternativa e indie, sendo apresentados diariamente os mais interessantes videoclips de propostas musicais provenientes dos quatro cantos do mundo(n)

programme.title: Consultório
programme.desc: Programa diário sobre saúde e medicina. Todos os dias os especialistas convidados, na primeira parte do programa, falam sobre as doenças que mais afetam a população portuguesa. Na segunda parte do programa, um médico especialista responde às dúvidas dos telespectadores, numa consulta em direto(n)

programme.title: Glitter Show
programme.desc: "Glitter Show", um programa apresentado por Carina Caldeira, com um convidado em estúdio e recheado de reportagens sobre lifestyle(n)

programme.title: Olá Maria!
programme.desc: O "Olá Maria!" pretende ser um programa de entretenimento de referência nas suas tardes televisivas, onde o formato deste combina várias vertentes, nomeadamente entrevista, rubricas e música, prometendo tornar-se num espaço de surpresas, emoções e claro, muito humor(n)

programme.title: Jornal: Universo Porto
programme.desc: Programa de informação desportiva, sobre conteúdos do FC Porto. Trata-se de um programa diário, de segunda a sexta-feira, com todas as informações do FC Porto, um olhar atento sobre o dia-a-dia do clube, com síntese sobre todas as modalidades(n)

programme.title: Uma Receita, 3 Possibilidades
programme.desc: Em 15 minutos, descubra como preparar três pratos diferentes a partir de uma única receita. Ponha já o seu avental(n)

programme.title: O Norte Somos Nós
programme.desc: Os Prémios "O Norte somos Nós" são dinamizados pela Comissão de Coordenação e Desenvolvimento Regional do Norte, com objetivos de dar visibilidade pública a pessoas e instituições associadas a projetos inovadores(n)

programme.title: Jornal Diário
programme.desc: Espaço noticioso dedicado à região norte, sem nunca descurar o país. Especial destaque para os comentários dos habituais convidados e às grandes reportagens(n)

programme.title: Estado do País
programme.desc: Em 25 minutos debatemos os temas da atualidade que marcam o país e o mundo. Desde a economia, à política, passando pelas artes entre muitos outros temas, sempre com especialistas em estúdio(n)

programme.title: China Hour
programme.desc: Espaço reservado a documentários, reportagens e muito mais, vindo da China(n)
